Krishna Shroff Wiki | Biography | Age | Affairs | Family

Bolly Reporter
10 months ago

Krishna Shroff is the daughter of Jackie Shroff and the sister of Tiger Shroff. She is a very gorgeous and active girl and already become viral in social media.

Biography & Wiki

Krishna Shroff’s nickname is Kishu. She was born on 21 January 1993 in Mumbai, Maharashtra, India. Therefore, her current age is 27 years. Krishna’s Zodiac is Aquarius.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Krishna’s height in feet is 5′ 4”. Also, her height in Centimeters is 163 cm.

Family Members

Krishna is the daughter of very popular actor Jackie Shroff and her mother’s name is Ayesha Shroff, who is a former model. Her brother is the popular current-gen actor Tiger Shroff.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

Krishna was dated with a Brazilian named Spenser Johnson, a family friend of the Shroffs. He is a football trainer by profession and works with a sports company.

She is currently dating Eban Hyams who has played professionally in the Australian National Basketball League.

Education and School, College

In her childhood, Krishna attended the American School of Bombay with her brother, Tiger Shroff.

Favorite Things

Salary and Net Worth

Krishna has an estimated net worth of almost $26 Million.

Contact Address

Filmography

Krishna has been a part of a documentary earlier, which was called the Black Sheep. The Documentary was made in the year 2015.

Facts about Krishna Shroff

  • Through her famous family members, she has inherited more than 340,000 followers just on Instagram.
  • She likes to travel a lot and as per the popular media, she wants to travel around the world.
  • Krishna is also very much interested in Photography.
  • Krishna coached basketball to high school students and she is very active in other sport and athletic activities.
  • Krishna grabbed headlines after a few pictures of her on Instagram went viral.
